item.description:
Saint Paddy's Day party for the pugs.... let's be green for the day.... lol... Please RSVP... gives me an idea how much coffee to make, etc.. you may bring a treat for pugs or for us humans.

Due to construction on my home.. yikes... we have changed location to Marie's back yard.. bring a chair... looks like it will be a nice day... hugs Patty

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Saint Paddy's Pug Party
